summary: Summarydearcloud's Energy Bright Eye Serum specially formulated to depuff and target dark circles. The metal applicator provides a light cooling effect that helps depuff as you gently work the product into the skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsCooling metal applicatorLightweight serum formulaMade in KoreaKey IngredientsVitamin C - Helps brighten dark circles.Dipeptide-2 - Helps reduce puffiness.Formulated WithoutParabenSulfateItem 2634911How To UseGently tap and spread product under and around eyes using metal applicator. Apply AM & PM.IngredientsAqua/Water, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Niacinamide, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Phragmites Communis Extract, Salicornia Herbacea Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Caffeine, Caulerpa Lentillifera Extract, Codium Fragile Extract, Ascorbic Acid, Dipeptide-2, Cetearyl Olivate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Sorbitan Olivate, Sodium Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Caprylyl Glycol, Xanthan Gum, Arachidyl Alcohol, Isohexadecane, Behenyl Alcohol, Allantoin, Panthenol, Arachidyl Glucoside, Ethylhexylglycerin, Polysorbate 80, Adenosine, Glyceryl Acrylate/Acrylic Acid Copolymer, Sorbitan Isostearate, Polysorbate 60, Sorbitan Oleate, Disodium EDTA, Fragrance.
how_to_use: Gently tap and spread product under and around eyes using metal applicator. Apply AM & PM.

reviews.headline: Great Product
reviews.comments: Great product.  I also love the easy clever applicator for this product. You don't have to touch any of the eye serum with your fingers. The product comes out of the tube at the point of the small hole when you squeeze. As the applicator is also metal, the eye serum feels cool on your skin surface as you apply it. This is now my to-go eye serum. I plan to buy again.

reviews.headline: Loving dearcloud
reviews.comments:
I'm loving dearcloud! I am fairly new to skincare, however I've tried fresh beauty and clinique regimens and nothing has ever really stuck. 

Recently, an Ulta employee (shoutout to McKenna in Leesburg, VA!) set me up with dearcloud products. I ordered this eye serum online as it wasn't in store. And let me tell you, it feels marvelous! The cooling tip is refreshing, the scent is pleasant, and my extreme senstive skin has tolerated it well! Highly recommend! 

Also, I'm really loving the dearcloud new/youth collagen cream, Mediheal collagen pads (pink box), and dearcloud facial cleanser. I'm experimenting with gradually adding in some Anua and Naturium serums as part of the routine as well. 

Thank you McKenna and thank you dearcloud! You've boosted this chronically ill/sensitive skin 30 year old's confidence!!
